GetAddOnVersion.description: Retrieves the version of the Tapir Additional JSON Commands Add-On.

version.description: Version number in the form of "1.1.1".

GetAddOnVersion.name: GetAddOnVersion

GetArchicadLocation.description: Retrieves the location of the currently running Archicad executable.

archicadLocation.description: The location of the Archicad executable in the filesystem.

GetArchicadLocation.name: GetArchicadLocation

QuitArchicad.description: Performs a quit operation on the currently running Archicad instance.
QuitArchicad.name: QuitArchicad

GetCurrentWindowType.description: Returns the type of the current (active) window.
GetCurrentWindowType.name: GetCurrentWindowType

GetProjectInfo.description: Retrieves information about the currently loaded project.

isUntitled.description: True, if the project is not saved yet.

isTeamwork.description: True, if the project is a Teamwork (BIMcloud) project.

projectLocation.description: The location of the project in the filesystem or a BIMcloud project reference.

projectPath.description: The path of the project. A filesystem path or a BIMcloud server relative path.

GetProjectInfo.name: GetProjectInfo

GetProjectInfoFields.description: Retrieves the names and values of all project info fields.
GetProjectInfoFields.name: GetProjectInfoFields

SetProjectInfoField.description: Sets the value of a project info field.

projectInfoId.description: The id of the project info field.

projectInfoValue.description: The new value of the project info field.

SetProjectInfoField.name: SetProjectInfoField

GetStories.description: Retrieves information about the story sructure of the currently loaded project.

skipNullFloor.description: Floor indices above ground-floor level may start with 1 instead of 0.

GetStories.name: GetStories

SetStories.description: Sets the story sructure of the currently loaded project.
SetStories.name: SetStories

GetHotlinks.description: Gets the file system locations (path) of the hotlink modules. The hotlinks can have tree hierarchy in the project.
GetHotlinks.name: GetHotlinks

projectFilePath.description: The target project file to open.

eastings.description: Location along the easting of the coordinate system of the target map coordinate reference system.

northings.description: Location along the northing of the coordinate system of the target map coordinate reference system.

elevation.description: Orthogonal height relative to the vertical datum specified.

crsName.description: Name by which the coordinate reference system is identified.

description.description: Informal description of this coordinate reference system.

geodeticDatum.description: Name by which this datum is identified.

verticalDatum.description: Name by which the vertical datum is identified.

mapProjection.description: Name by which the map projection is identified.

mapZone.description: Name by which the map zone, relating to the MapProjection, is identified.

eastings.description: Location along the easting of the coordinate system of the target map coordinate reference system.

northings.description: Location along the northing of the coordinate system of the target map coordinate reference system.

elevation.description: Orthogonal height relative to the vertical datum specified.

crsName.description: Name by which the coordinate reference system is identified.

description.description: Informal description of this coordinate reference system.

geodeticDatum.description: Name by which this datum is identified.

verticalDatum.description: Name by which the vertical datum is identified.

mapProjection.description: Name by which the map projection is identified.

mapZone.description: Name by which the map zone, relating to the MapProjection, is identified.

method.description: The file operation method to use.

ifcFilePath.description: The target IFC file to use.

fileType.description: The type of the IFC file. The default is 'ifc'.

GetSelectedElements.description: Gets the list of the currently selected elements.
GetSelectedElements.name: GetSelectedElements

GetElementsByType.description: Returns the identifier of every element of the given type on the plan. It works for any type. Use the optional filter parameter for filtering.
GetElementsByType.name: GetElementsByType

GetAllElements.description: Returns the identifier of all elements on the plan. Use the optional filter parameter for filtering.
GetAllElements.name: GetAllElements

ChangeSelectionOfElements.description: Adds/removes a number of elements to/from the current selection.
ChangeSelectionOfElements.name: ChangeSelectionOfElements

FilterElements.description: Tests an elements by the given criterias.
FilterElements.name: FilterElements

GetDetailsOfElements.description: Gets the details of the given elements (geometry parameters etc).

items.description: Details of an element.

GetDetailsOfElements.name: GetDetailsOfElements

SetDetailsOfElements.description: Sets the details of the given elements (floor, layer, order etc).
SetDetailsOfElements.name: SetDetailsOfElements

Get3DBoundingBoxes.description: Get the 3D bounding box of elements. The bounding box is calculated from the global origin in the 3D view. The output is the array of the bounding boxes respective to the input array of elements.
Get3DBoundingBoxes.name: Get3DBoundingBoxes

GetSubelementsOfHierarchicalElements.description: Gets the subelements of the given hierarchical elements.

items.description: Subelements grouped by type.

GetSubelementsOfHierarchicalElements.name: GetSubelementsOfHierarchicalElements

GetConnectedElements.description: Gets connected elements of the given elements.
GetConnectedElements.name: GetConnectedElements

GetZoneBoundaries.description: Gets the boundaries of the given Zone (connected elements, neighbour zones, etc.).
GetZoneBoundaries.name: GetZoneBoundaries

GetCollisions.description: Detect collisions between the given two groups of elements.

volumeTolerance.description: Intersection body volume greater then this value will be considered as a collision. Default value is 0.001.

performSurfaceCheck.description: Enables surface collision check. If disabled the surfaceTolerance value will be ignored. By default it's false.

surfaceTolerance.description: Intersection body surface area greater then this value will be considered as a collision. Default value is 0.001.

GetCollisions.name: GetCollisions

HighlightElements.description: Highlights the elements given in the elements array. In case of empty elements array removes all previously set highlights.

highlightedColors.description: A list of colors to highlight elements.

items.description: Color of the highlighted element as an [r, g, b, a] array. Each component must be in the 0-255 range.

wireframe3D.description: Optional parameter. Switch non highlighted elements in the 3D window to wireframe.

nonHighlightedColor.description: Optional parameter. Color of the non highlighted elements as an [r, g, b, a] array. Each component must be in the 0-255 range.

HighlightElements.name: HighlightElements

MoveElements.description: Moves elements with a given vector.

elementsWithMoveVectors.description: The elements with move vector pairs.

copy.description: Optional parameter. If true, then a copy of the element will be moved. By default it's false.

MoveElements.name: MoveElements

GetGDLParametersOfElements.description: Gets all the GDL parameters (name, type, value) of the given elements.
GetGDLParametersOfElements.name: GetGDLParametersOfElements

SetGDLParametersOfElements.description: Sets the given GDL parameters of the given elements.

elementsWithGDLParameters.description: The elements with GDL parameters dictionary pairs.

SetGDLParametersOfElements.name: SetGDLParametersOfElements

GetClassificationsOfElements.description: Returns the classification of the given elements in the given classification systems. It works for subelements of hierarchal elements also.

elementClassifications.description: The list of element classification item identifiers. Order of the ids are the same as in the input. Non-existing elements or non-existing classification systems are represented by error objects.

GetClassificationsOfElements.name: GetClassificationsOfElements

SetClassificationsOfElements.description: Sets the classifications of elements. In order to set the classification of an element to unclassified, omit the classificationItemId field. It works for subelements of hierarchal elements also.
SetClassificationsOfElements.name: SetClassificationsOfElements

CreateColumns.description: Creates Column elements based on the given parameters.

columnsData.description: Array of data to create Columns.

items.description: The parameters of the new Column.

CreateColumns.name: CreateColumns

CreateSlabs.description: Creates Slab elements based on the given parameters.

slabsData.description: Array of data to create Slabs.

items.description: The parameters of the new Slab.

level.description: The Z coordinate value of the reference line of the slab.

polygonCoordinates.description: The 2D coordinates of the edge of the slab.

polygonArcs.description: Polygon outline arcs of the slab.

CreateSlabs.name: CreateSlabs

CreateZones.description: Creates Zone elements based on the given parameters.

zonesData.description: Array of data to create Zones.

items.description: The parameters of the new Zone.

name.description: Name of the zone.

categoryAttributeId.description: The identifier of the zone category attribute.

stampPosition.description: Position of the origin of the zone stamp.

CreateZones.name: CreateZones

CreatePolylines.description: Creates Polyline elements based on the given parameters.

polylinesData.description: Array of data to create Polylines.

items.description: The parameters of the new Polyline.

floorInd.description: The identifier of the floor. Optional parameter, by default the current floor is used.

CreatePolylines.name: CreatePolylines

CreateObjects.description: Creates Object elements based on the given parameters.

objectsData.description: Array of data to create Objects.

items.description: The parameters of the new Object.

libraryPartName.description: The name of the library part to use.

CreateObjects.name: CreateObjects

CreateMeshes.description: Creates Mesh elements based on the given parameters.

meshesData.description: Array of data to create Meshes.

items.description: The parameters of the new Mesh.

level.description: The Z reference level of coordinates.

polygonCoordinates.description: The 3D coordinates of the outline polygon of the mesh.

polygonArcs.description: Polygon outline arcs of the mesh.

sublines.description: The leveling sublines inside the polygon of the mesh.

coordinates.description: The 3D coordinates of the leveling subline of the mesh.

CreateMeshes.name: CreateMeshes

CreateLabels.description: Creates Label elements based on the given parameters.

labelsData.description: Array of data to create Labels.

items.description: The parameters of the new Label.

parentElementId.description: The parent element if the label is an associative label.

text.description: The text content if the label is a text label.

begCoordinate.description: The begin coordinate of leader line. Optional parameter, but either begCoordinate or parentElementId must be provided.

floorInd.description: The identifier of the floor. Optional parameter, by default the current floor or the floor of the parent element is used.

CreateLabels.name: CreateLabels

GetElementPreviewImage.description: Returns the preview image of the given element.

imageType.description: The type of the preview image. Default is 3D.

format.description: The image format. Default is png.

width.description: The width of the preview image in pixels. Default is 128.

height.description: The height of the preview image in pixels. Default is 128.

GetElementPreviewImage.name: GetElementPreviewImage

GetRoomImage.description: Returns the room image of the given zone.

format.description: The image format. Default is png.

width.description: The width of the preview image in pixels. Default is 256.

height.description: The height of the preview image in pixels. Default is 256.

offset.description: Offset of the clip polygon from the edge of the zone. Default is 0.001.

scale.description: Scale of the view (e.g. 0.005 for 1:200). Default is 0.005.

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the generated image. Default is white (1.0, 1.0, 1.0).

GetRoomImage.name: GetRoomImage

SetElementNotificationClient.description: Sets up a new notification client to receive element events.

host.description: The host address of the notification client. If not provided, localhost is used.

port.description: The port number of the notification client.

notifyOnNewElement.description: Notify on creation of a new element.

notifyOnModificationOfAnElement.description: Notify on modification/deletion of an element.

notifyOnReservationChanges.description: Notify on reservation changes of an element.

SetElementNotificationClient.name: SetElementNotificationClient

host.description: The host address of the notification client. If not provided, localhost is used.

port.description: The port number of the notification client.

GetFavoritesByType.description: Returns a list of the names of all favorites with the given element type
GetFavoritesByType.name: GetFavoritesByType

GetFavoritePreviewImage.description: Returns the preview image of the given favorite.

imageType.description: The type of the preview image. Default is 3D.

format.description: The image format. Default is png.

width.description: The width of the preview image in pixels. Default is 128.

height.description: The height of the preview image in pixels. Default is 128.

GetFavoritePreviewImage.name: GetFavoritePreviewImage

ApplyFavoritesToElementDefaults.description: Apply the given favorites to element defaults.
ApplyFavoritesToElementDefaults.name: ApplyFavoritesToElementDefaults

CreateFavoritesFromElements.description: Create favorites from the given elements.

items.description: The identifier of the element and the name of the new favorite.

CreateFavoritesFromElements.name: CreateFavoritesFromElements

GetAllProperties.description: Returns all user defined and built-in properties.
GetAllProperties.name: GetAllProperties

GetPropertyValuesOfElements.description: Returns the property values of the elements for the given property. It works for subelements of hierarchal elements also.

propertyValuesForElements.description: List of property value lists. The order of the outer list is that of the given elements. The order of the inner lists are that of the given properties.

GetPropertyValuesOfElements.name: GetPropertyValuesOfElements

SetPropertyValuesOfElements.description: Sets the property values of elements. It works for subelements of hierarchal elements also.
SetPropertyValuesOfElements.name: SetPropertyValuesOfElements

GetPropertyValuesOfAttributes.description: Returns the property values of the attributes for the given property.

propertyValuesForAttributes.description: List of property value lists. The order of the outer list is that of the given attributes. The order of the inner lists are that of the given properties.

GetPropertyValuesOfAttributes.name: GetPropertyValuesOfAttributes

SetPropertyValuesOfAttributes.description: Sets the property values of attributes.
SetPropertyValuesOfAttributes.name: SetPropertyValuesOfAttributes

CreatePropertyGroups.description: Creates Property Groups based on the given parameters.

propertyGroups.description: The parameters of the new property groups.

propertyGroupIds.description: The identifiers of the created property groups.

CreatePropertyGroups.name: CreatePropertyGroups

DeletePropertyGroups.description: Deletes the given Custom Property Groups.

propertyGroupIds.description: The identifiers of property groups to delete.

DeletePropertyGroups.name: DeletePropertyGroups

CreatePropertyDefinitions.description: Creates Custom Property Definitions based on the given parameters.

propertyDefinitions.description: The parameters of the new properties.

CreatePropertyDefinitions.name: CreatePropertyDefinitions

DeletePropertyDefinitions.description: Deletes the given Custom Property Definitions.

propertyIds.description: The identifiers of properties to delete.

DeletePropertyDefinitions.name: DeletePropertyDefinitions

GetAttributesByType.description: Returns the details of every attribute of the given type.
GetAttributesByType.name: GetAttributesByType

CreateLayers.description: Creates or overwrites Layer attributes based on the given parameters.

layerDataArray.description: Array of data to create new Layers.

items.description: Data to create a Layer.

attributeId.description: Indentifier of the existing Layer to overwrite, ignored if overwriteExisting is false.

index.description: Index of the existing Layer to overwrite, ignored if overwriteExisting is false.

name.description: Name. If overwriteExisting is true, then the existing Layer with the given name will be overwritten.

intersectionGroupNr.description: Intersection group. Elements on layers having the same group will be intersected.

overwriteExisting.description: Overwrite the Layer if exists with the same name, or if index is given with the same index. The default is false.

CreateLayers.name: CreateLayers

CreateLayerCombinations.description: Creates or overwrites Layer Combination attributes based on the given parameters.

layerCombinationDataArray.description: Array of data to create new Layer Combinations.

items.description: Data to create a Layer Combination.

attributeId.description: Indentifier of the existing Layer Combination to overwrite, ignored if overwriteExisting is false.

index.description: Index of the existing Layer Combination to overwrite, ignored if overwriteExisting is false.

name.description: Name. If overwriteExisting is true, then the existing Layer Combination with the given name will be overwritten.

overwriteExisting.description: Overwrite the Layer Combination if exists with the same guid/index/name. The default is false.

CreateLayerCombinations.name: CreateLayerCombinations

CreateBuildingMaterials.description: Creates or overwrites Building Material attributes based on the given parameters.

buildingMaterialDataArray.description: Array of data to create new Building Materials.

items.description: Data to create a Building Material.

attributeId.description: Indentifier of the existing Building Material to overwrite, ignored if overwriteExisting is false.

index.description: Index of the existing Building Material to overwrite, ignored if overwriteExisting is false.

name.description: Name. If overwriteExisting is true, then the existing Building Material with the given name will be overwritten.

overwriteExisting.description: Overwrite the Building Material if exists with the same name, or if index is given with the same index. The default is false.

CreateBuildingMaterials.name: CreateBuildingMaterials

CreateComposites.description: Creates or overwrites Composite attributes based on the given parameters.

compositeDataArray.description: Array of data to create Composites.

items.description: Data to create a Composite.

attributeId.description: Indentifier of the existing Composite to overwrite, ignored if overwriteExisting is false.

index.description: Index of the existing Composite to overwrite, ignored if overwriteExisting is false.

name.description: Name. If overwriteExisting is true, then the existing Composite with the given name will be overwritten.

useWith.description: Array of types the composite can used with.

items.description: Element type (Wall, Slab, Roof, or Shell)
Data to represent a skin.

separators.description: Array of skin separator data. The number of items must be the number of skins plus one.

items.description: Data to represent a skin separator.

overwriteExisting.description: Overwrite the Composite if exists with the same name, or if index is given with the same index. The default is false.

CreateComposites.name: CreateComposites

CreateSurfaces.description: Creates or overwrites Surface attributes based on the given parameters.

surfaceDataArray.description: Array of data to create new surfaces.

items.description: Data to create a surface.

attributeId.description: Indentifier of the existing Surface to overwrite, ignored if overwriteExisting is false.

index.description: Index of the existing surface to overwrite, ignored if overwriteExisting is false.

name.description: Name. If overwriteExisting is true, then the existing surface with the given name will be overwritten.

overwriteExisting.description: Overwrite the Surface if exists with the same name, or if index is given with the same index. The default is false.

CreateSurfaces.name: CreateSurfaces

GetBuildingMaterialPhysicalProperties.description: Retrieves the physical properties of the given Building Materials.
GetBuildingMaterialPhysicalProperties.name: GetBuildingMaterialPhysicalProperties

GetLayerCombinations.description: Returns the details of layer combination attributes.
GetLayerCombinations.name: GetLayerCombinations

GetLibraries.description: Gets the list of loaded libraries.

items.description: Library

name.description: Library name.

path.description: A filesystem path to library location.

twServerUrl.description: URL address of the TeamWork server hosting the library.

urlWebLibrary.description: URL of the downloaded Internet library.

GetLibraries.name: GetLibraries

AddFilesToEmbeddedLibrary.description: Adds the given files into the embedded library.
AddFilesToEmbeddedLibrary.name: AddFilesToEmbeddedLibrary

TeamworkSend.description: Performs a send operation on the currently opened Teamwork project.
TeamworkSend.name: TeamworkSend

TeamworkReceive.description: Performs a receive operation on the currently opened Teamwork project.
TeamworkReceive.name: TeamworkReceive

PublishPublisherSet.description: Performs a publish operation on the currently opened project. Only the given publisher set will be published.

publisherSetName.description: The name of the publisher set.

outputPath.description: Full local or LAN path for publishing. Optional, by default the path set in the settings of the publisher set will be used.

PublishPublisherSet.name: PublishPublisherSet

UpdateDrawings.description: Performs a drawing update on the given elements.
UpdateDrawings.name: UpdateDrawings

GetDatabaseIdFromNavigatorItemId.description: Gets the ID of the database associated with the supplied navigator item id
GetDatabaseIdFromNavigatorItemId.name: GetDatabaseIdFromNavigatorItemId

items.description: Represents the model view options.

GetViewSettings.description: Gets the view settings of navigator items
GetViewSettings.name: GetViewSettings

SetViewSettings.description: Sets the view settings of navigator items
SetViewSettings.name: SetViewSettings

GetView2DTransformations.description: Get zoom and rotation of 2D views
GetView2DTransformations.name: GetView2DTransformations

name.description: The name of the issue.

tagText.description: Tag text of the issue, optional.

acceptAllElements.description: Accept all creation/deletion/modification of the deleted issue. By default false.

name.description: Issue name

isTagTextElemVisible.description: The visibility of the attached tag text element

AddCommentToIssue.description: Adds a new comment to the specified issue.

author.description: The author of the new comment.

AddCommentToIssue.name: AddCommentToIssue

GetCommentsFromIssue.description: Retrieves comments information from the specified issue.
GetCommentsFromIssue.name: GetCommentsFromIssue

AttachElementsToIssue.description: Attaches elements to the specified issue.
AttachElementsToIssue.name: AttachElementsToIssue

DetachElementsFromIssue.description: Detaches elements from the specified issue.
DetachElementsFromIssue.name: DetachElementsFromIssue

GetElementsAttachedToIssue.description: Retrieves attached elements of the specified issue, filtered by attachment type.
GetElementsAttachedToIssue.name: GetElementsAttachedToIssue

ExportIssuesToBCF.description: Exports specified issues to a BCF file.

issues.description: Leave it empty to export all issues.

exportPath.description: The os path to the bcf file, including it's name.

useExternalId.description: Use external IFC ID or Archicad IFC ID as referenced in BCF topics.

alignBySurveyPoint.description: Align BCF views by Archicad Survey Point or Archicad Project Origin.

ExportIssuesToBCF.name: ExportIssuesToBCF

ImportIssuesFromBCF.description: Imports issues from the specified BCF file.

importPath.description: The os path to the bcf file, including it's name.

alignBySurveyPoint.description: Align BCF views by Archicad Survey Point or Archicad Project Origin.

ImportIssuesFromBCF.name: ImportIssuesFromBCF

GetCurrentRevisionChangesOfLayouts.description: Retrieves all changes belong to the last revision of the given layouts.
GetCurrentRevisionChangesOfLayouts.name: GetCurrentRevisionChangesOfLayouts

GetRevisionChangesOfElements.description: Retrieves the changes belong to the given elements.
GetRevisionChangesOfElements.name: GetRevisionChangesOfElements

GetDesignOptions.description: Retrieves information about existing design options. Available from Archicad 29.

designOptionId.description: The guid identifier of the design option.

name.description: The name of the design option.

id.description: The string id of the design option.

ownerSetName.description: The name of the owner design option set.

GetDesignOptions.name: GetDesignOptions

GetDesignOptionSets.description: Retrieves information about existing design option sets. Available from Archicad 29.

designOptionSetId.description: The guid identifier of the design option set.

name.description: The name of the design option set.

designOptions.description: The list of design options in the set.

GetDesignOptionSets.name: GetDesignOptionSets

GetDesignOptionCombinations.description: Retrieves information about existing design option combinations.

designOptionCombinationId.description: The guid identifier of the design option combination.

name.description: The name of the design option combination.

activeDesignOptions.description: The list of active design options in the combination. Available from Archicad 29.

GetDesignOptionCombinations.name: GetDesignOptionCombinations

GenerateDocumentation.description: Generates files for the documentation. Used by Tapir developers only.

destinationFolder.description: Destination folder for the generated documentation files.

GenerateDocumentation.name: GenerateDocumentation

SurfaceType.description: The type of a surface material.

LayersOfLayerCombination.description: List of Layers included in the Layer Combination.

attributeId.description: The identifier of the Layer attribute.

isHidden.description: Visibility of the Layer in the Layer Combination.

isLocked.description: Lock state of the Layer in the Layer Combination.

isWireframe.description: Is wireframe mode forced for the Layer in the Layer Combination.

intersectionGroupNr.description: Intersection group of the Layer in the Layer Combination. Elements on layers having the same group will be intersected.

LayerCombinationAttributeDetails.description: The details of the layer combination attribute.

attributeId.description: The identifier of the layer combination attribute.

attributeIndex.description: The index identifier of the layer combination attribute.

name.description: The name of the layer combination.

LayerCombinationAttributeOrError.description: A layer combination attribute or an error.

Guid.description: A Globally Unique Identifier (or Universally Unique Identifier) in its string representation as defined in RFC 4122.

Hotlink.description: The details of a hotlink node.

location.description: The path of the hotlink file.

children.description: The children of the hotlink node if it has any.

PossibleStringValues.description: The possible string values of a GDL parameter.

PossibleNumericValues.description: The possible numeric values of a GDL parameter.

name.description: The name of the parameter.

displayName.description: The display name of the parameter.

dimension1.description: The 1st dimension of array (in case of array value).

dimension2.description: The 2nd dimension of array (in case of array value).

valueDescription.description: The value description for numeric parameter.

isLocked.description: The parameter is locked; i.e. the user cannot modify it

canHaveCustomValue.description: The parameter can have a custom value.

name.description: The name of the parameter.

PolyArc.description: Representation of an arc segment of a two dimensional polygon/polyline.

begIndex.description: Node index of one end point of the arc.

endIndex.description: Node index of the other end point of the arc.

arcAngle.description: Angle of the arc; it is positive, if the arc is on the right-hand side of the straight segment.

name.description: The filename of the texture in the library (without extension).

xSize.description: X size of the picture in model space, by default 1.

ySize.description: Y size of the picture in model space, by default 1.

FillRectangle.description: True, if fit the rectangle with the picture in a central position, using the natural aspect ratio of the picture.

FitPicture.description: True, if fit the picture in the middle of the rectangle, using the natural aspect ratio of the picture.

mirrorX.description: True, if the texture is mirrored in X direction.

mirrorY.description: True, if the texture is mirrored in Y direction.

useAlphaChannel.description: True, if the alpha channel of the texture is used.

alphaChannelChangesTransparency.description: True, if the alpha channel of the texture changes the transparency.

alphaChannelChangesSurfaceColor.description: True, if the alpha channel of the texture changes the surface color.

alphaChannelChangesAmbientColor.description: True, if the alpha channel of the texture changes the ambient color.

alphaChannelChangesSpecularColor.description: True, if the alpha channel of the texture changes the specular color.

alphaChannelChangesDiffuseColor.description: True, if the alpha channel of the texture changes the diffuse color.

SuccessfulExecutionResult.description: The result of a successful execution.

FailedExecutionResult.description: The result of a failed execution.

error.description: The details of an execution failure.

ElementFilter.description: A filter type for an element.

IssueElementType.description: The attachment type of an element component of an issue.

IssueCommentStatus.description: The status of an issue comment.

PropertyGroupId.description: The identifier of a property group.

PropertyGroupIdArrayItem.description: A wrapper containing the property group identifier.

PropertyIdArrayItem.description: A wrapper containing the property identifier.

PropertyValue.description: The display string value of a property.

PropertyValueArrayItem.description: A wrapper containing the property value.

PropertyValueOrErrorItem.description: A property value or an error

PropertyValuesArrayItem.description: A wrapper containing the property values.

PropertyValuesOrError.description: A list of property values or an error.

PropertyValuesOrErrorArray.description: A list of property value lists.

ElementPropertyValue.description: A property value with the identifiers of the property and its owner element.

ElementPropertyValues.description: A list of element property values.

AttributePropertyValue.description: A property value with the identifiers of the property and its owner attribute.

AttributePropertyValues.description: A list of attribute property values.

DisplayValueEnumId.description: An enumeration value identifier using the displayed value.

NonLocalizedValueEnumId.description: An enumeration value identifier using the nonlocalized value.

EnumValueId.description: The identifier of a property enumeration value.

EnumValueIdArrayItem.description: A wrapper containing the identifier of a property enumeration value.

NormalOrUserUndefinedPropertyValue.description: A normal or a userUndefined property value.

PropertyValueDetails.description: A normal, userUndefined, notAvailable or notEvaluated property value.

UserUndefinedPropertyValue.description: A userUndefined value means that there is no actual number/string/etc. value, but the user deliberately set an Undefined value: this is a valid value, too.

NotAvailablePropertyValue.description: A notAvailable value means that the property is not available for the property owner (and therefore it has no property value for it).

NormalNumberPropertyValue.description: A number property value containing a valid numeric value.

NormalIntegerPropertyValue.description: An integer property value containing a valid integer number.

NormalStringPropertyValue.description: A string property value containing a valid string.

NormalBooleanPropertyValue.description: A boolean property value containing a valid boolean value.

NormalLengthPropertyValue.description: A length property value containing a real length value. The value is measured in SI (meters).

NormalAreaPropertyValue.description: An area property value containing a real area. The value is measured in SI (square meters).

NormalVolumePropertyValue.description: A volume property value containing a real volume. The value is measured in SI (cubic meters).

NormalAnglePropertyValue.description: An angle property value containing a real angle. The value is measured in SI (radians).

NormalNumberListPropertyValue.description: A number list property value containing numbers in an array.

NormalIntegerListPropertyValue.description: An integer list property value containing integers in an array.

NormalStringListPropertyValue.description: A string list property value containing strings in an array.

NormalBooleanListPropertyValue.description: A boolean list property value containing boolean values in an array.

NormalLengthListPropertyValue.description: A length list property value containing length values in an array. The values are measured in SI (meters).

NormalAreaListPropertyValue.description: An area list property value containing areas in an array. The values are measured in SI (square meters).

NormalVolumeListPropertyValue.description: A volume list property value containing volumes in an array. The values are measured in SI (cubic meters).

NormalAngleListPropertyValue.description: An angle list property value containing angles in an array. The values are measured in SI (radians).

NormalSingleEnumPropertyValue.description: A single enumeration property value containing the ID of the selected enum value.

NormalMultiEnumPropertyValue.description: A multiple choice enumeration property value containing the IDs of the selected enum values in an array.

BasicDefaultValue.description: Default value of the property in case of a basic property value (ie. not an expression).

ExpressionDefaultValue.description: Default value of the property in case of an expression based property value.

ClassificationSystemId.description: The identifier of a classification system.

ClassificationSystemIds.description: A list of classification system identifiers.

ClassificationItemId.description: The identifier of a classification item.

classificationItemId.description: The element's classification in the given system. If no value is specified here, the element is Unclassified in this system.

ClassificationIdArrayItem.description: A wrapper containing the classification identifier.

ClassificationIdOrError.description: A classification identifier or an error.

ClassificationIdsOrErrors.description: A list of element classification identifiers or errors.

ElementClassificationItemArray.description: A wrapper containing a list of element classification identifiers or errors.

ElementClassificationsOrErrors.description: A list of element classification identifiers or errors.

ElementClassifications.description: A list of element classification identifiers.

BoundingBox3D.description: A 3D bounding box of an element.

xMin.description: The minimum X value of the bounding box.

yMin.description: The minimum Y value of the bounding box.

zMin.description: The minimum Z value of the bounding box.

xMax.description: The maximum X value of the bounding box.

yMax.description: The maximum Y value of the bounding box.

zMax.description: The maximum Z value of the bounding box.

BoundingBox3DArrayItem.description: A wrapper containing a 3D bounding box.

BoundingBox3DOrError.description: A 3D bounding box or an error.

NavigatorItemIds.description: A list of navigator item identifiers.

NavigatorItemId.description: The identifier of a navigator item.

ViewSettings.description: The settings of a navigator view

modelViewOptions.description: The name of the model view options. If empty, the view has custom model view options.

layerCombination.description: The name of the layer combination. If empty, the view has custom layer combination.

dimensionStyle.description: The name of the dimension style. If empty, the view has custom dimension style.

penSetName.description: The name of the pen set. If empty, the view has custom pen set.

graphicOverrideCombination.description: The name of the graphic override combination. If empty, the view has custom graphic override combination.

zoom.description: The actual zoom parameters, rectangular region of the model.

xMin.description: The minimum X value of the zoom box.

yMin.description: The minimum Y value of the zoom box.

xMax.description: The maximum X value of the zoom box.

yMax.description: The maximum Y value of the zoom box.

Hole2D.description: A 2D hole in an element defined by closed polylines

polygonOutline.description: The 2D coordinates of the edge of the hole.

polygonArcs.description: Polygon outline arcs of the hole.

Holes2D.description: A list of 2D holes in an element defined by closed polylines

Hole3D.description: A 3D hole in an element defined by closed polylines

polygonCoordinates.description: The 3D coordinates of the polygon of the hole.

polygonArcs.description: Polygon outline arcs of the hole.

Holes3D.description: A list of 3D holes in an element defined by closed polylines

bottomOffset.description: base level of the wall relative to the floor level

offset.description: wall's base line's offset from ref. line

arcAngle.description: The arc angle of the curved wall in radians.

begThickness.description: Thickness at the beginning in case of trapezoid wall

endThickness.description: Thickness at the end in case of trapezoid wall

polygonOutline.description: Polygon outline in case of polygonal wall

polygonArcs.description: Polygon arcs in case of polygonal wall

level.description: base height of the beam relative to the floor level

offset.description: beam ref.line offset from the center

slantAngle.description: The slant angle of the beam in radians.

arcAngle.description: The arc angle of the (horizontally) curved beam in radians.

verticalCurveHeight.description: The height of the vertical curve of the beam.

level.description: Distance of the reference level of the slab from the floor level.

offsetFromTop.description: Vertical distance between the reference level and the top of the slab.

polygonArcs.description: Polygon outline arcs of the slab.

bottomOffset.description: base level of the column relative to the floor level

angle.description: The rotation angle (radian) of the marker symbol

clipPolygon.description: The clip polygon of the detail/worksheet

referredView.description: Guid of the referred view. Only if the marker refers to a view.

referredDrawing.description: Guid of the referred drawing. Only if the marker refers to a drawing.

referredPMViewPoint.description: Guid of the referred view point. Only if the marker refers to a view point.

name.description: Name of the zone.

categoryAttributeId.description: The identifier of the zone category attribute.

stampPosition.description: Position of the origin of the zone stamp.

isManual.description: Is the coordinates of the zone manually placed?

polygonCoordinates.description: The 2D coordinates of the edge of the zone.

polygonArcs.description: Polygon outline arcs of the zone.

angle.description: The rotation angle of the curtain wall in radians.

gridAngle.description: The angle of the grid in radians.

isNegativeArc.description: Indicates if the arc is negative.

polygonCoordinates.description: The 3D coordinates of the panel polygon.

isHidden.description: Indicates if the panel is hidden (deleted panels remain in the database).

segmentIndex.description: The index of the curtain wall segment to which this panel belongs.

CurtainWallFrameType.description: Enumeration of available curtain wall frame types.

panelConnectionHole.description: The parameters of the panel connection hole.

d.description: Depth of the panel connection hole.

w.description: Width of the panel connection hole.

frameContour.description: The parameters of the frame contour.

segmentIndex.description: The index of the curtain wall segment to which this frame belongs.

MeshSkirtType.description: The type of the skirt structure.

level.description: The Z reference level of coordinates.

polygonCoordinates.description: The 3D coordinates of the outline polygon of the mesh.

polygonArcs.description: Polygon outline arcs of the mesh.

sublines.description: The leveling sublines inside the polygon of the mesh.

coordinates.description: The 3D coordinates of the leveling subline of the mesh.

TypeSpecificDetails.description: Represents the complete type-specific details of an element. Used as output from GET requests

RevisionIssueId.description: The identifier of a revision issue.

DocumentRevisionId.description: The identifier of a document revision.

DocumentRevisionReference.description: A reference to a document revision belonging to the current issue

DocumentRevisionReferences.description: All document revisions belong to the current issue.

firstRevisionIssueId.description: The identifier of the first issue in which the given change is issued.

changes.description: All changes belonging to the given document revision.

RevisionChangesArrayItem.description: A wrapper containing an array of revision changes

StoryParameters.description: Represents all parameters of a single project story, including its unique identifiers. Used in API responses.

dispOnSections.description: Story level lines should appear on sections and elevations.

name.description: The name of the story.

StoriesParameters.description: A list of project stories, each with their complete parameters.

StorySettings.description: Contains the configurable settings for creating or modifying a story. Used as input in API requests.

dispOnSections.description: Story level lines should appear on sections and elevations.

name.description: The name of the story.

StoriesSettings.description: A list of story settings, used as input for creating or modifying multiple stories.

referencePosition.description: Reference point to automatically find zone.

polygonCoordinates.description: The 2D coordinates of the edge of the zone.

polygonArcs.description: Polygon outline arcs of the zone.

ZoneCreationGeometry.description: Defines the geometry of a zone. Used as input for creating zones.

bottomOffset.description: base level of the wall relative to the floor level

offset.description: wall's base line's offset from ref. line

begThickness.description: Thickness at the beginning in case of trapezoid wall

endThickness.description: Thickness at the end in case of trapezoid wall

TypeSpecificSettings.description: Defines the modifiable type-specific settings for an element. Used as input for SET requests.

PropertyGroupArrayItem.description: A wrapper containing a property group

possibleEnumValues.description: The possible enum values of the property when the property type is enumeration.

enumValue.description: The description of an enumeration value.

nonLocalizedValue.description: Nonlocalized value of the enumeration if there is one.

availability.description: The identifiers of classification items the new property is available for.

group.description: The property group defined by name or id. If both fields exists the id will be used.

PropertyDefinitionArrayItem.description: A wrapper containing a property definition

items.description: The name of a favorite.

connectedElementId.description: The unique identifier of the connected element.

isExternal.description: True if the boundary is an external one.

neighbouringZoneElementId.description: Returns the unique identifier of the other Zone the element connects to if the boundary is internal. Please note that this boundary does not represent the boundary of the element with the other Zone.

area.description: The area of the polygon of the boundary.

polygonOutline.description: The outline polygon of the boundary.

ZoneBoundariesResponseOrError.description: The response of the zone boundaries command or an error.

BuildingMaterialPhysicalPropertiesList.description: A list of building material physical properties

BuildingMaterialPhysicalProperties.description: The physical properties of a single building material.

ProjectInfoFields.description: A list of project info fields.

projectInfoId.description: The id of the project info field.

projectInfoName.description: The name of the project info field visible on UI.

projectInfoValue.description: The value of the project info field.

LibraryFileAdditions.description: A list of library file additions to the embedded library

inputPath.description: The path to the input file.

outputPath.description: The relative path to the new file inside embedded library.

type.description: The type of the library part. By default 'Pict'.

LibraryPartType.description: Enumeration of available library part types.

GetElementsByTypeResponse.description: The response of the GetElementsByType command.

GetElementsByTypeResponseOrError.description: The response of the GetElementsByType command or an error.

GetFavoritesByTypeResponse.description: The response of the GetFavoritesByType command.

GetFavoritesByTypeResponseOrError.description: The response of the GetFavoritesByType command or an error.

GetConnectedElementsResponse.description: The response of the GetConnectedElements command.

GetConnectedElementsResponseOrError.description: The response of the GetConnectedElements command or an error.

GetAttributesByTypeResponse.description: The response of the GetAttributesByType command.

name.description: Name of the attribute.

GetAttributesByTypeResponseOrError.description: The response of the GetAttributesByType command or an error.
